definition: (used in names of people and shops, symbolizing prosperity)
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Ham laid Yue on the floor and bent over to kiss him on his shapely chest.
sentences.chinese: 灝明把櫟鑫放在地板上，彎下身親吻他漂亮的胸膛。

definition: clear/vast and deep/classifier for a body of clear water
